page.title: 15HOLIDAY MAKERS
page.content: People are attracted to Pensarn by its beach and the many amusement arcades it has to offer. However,it is arguable that the main reason that people come to Pensarn is because its situation makes it an excellent base from which to spend a holiday: a few large towns are within easy reach of Pensarn such as Colwyn Bay, Rhyl and Llandudno so shopping is easy; but the advantage Pensarn has over these places is that it is quieter and its atmosphere is much less rushed.There is a large fairground and beach at Rhyl only a few miles away. There are a number of holiday camps catering for tourists in Pensarn. Mainly, the accommodation is a static caravan or a chalet, although touring caravans and tents are catered for.
